description:
In the pursuit of her dream, protagonist Lin works alone at an animation company in a big city, finding herself too busy to answer her father's messages.

She was given an important role in a new project. However, under the pressure of the schedule her inspiration dries up and she falls into a low point where she can't bring herself to draw anymore. Losing confidence in herself, Lin decides to go back to her hometown.

(Source: Youtube Description, edited)
